summary: All four requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-4) have been implemented. The backend stores messages with text, timestamp, and sender role. The frontend displays a chat interface with message list, input area, and send button. Messages are sent to the backend and persist across refreshes. The design uses an emerald/green color scheme (not blue or purple) with modern typography and clean spacing.
